title: MOOC-Based Social Education Design for Citizens

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and social studies knowledge at secondary education level
context.additional_context: Learners engage in asynchronous learning using personal devices such as smartphones and tablets, with the goal of enhancing understanding of various social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain key concepts of social structure at 80% or higher proficiency six months later.
Learners can improve critical thinking skills for analyzing and discussing various social issues by 70% or more.
Learners can effectively apply self-directed learning strategies in digital learning environments at 85% or higher by the end of the course.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
